submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        arr = [target[i]-nums[i] for i in range(n)]
        l = 0
        def get(i:int,j:int,flag:bool)->int:
            res = 0
            shift = 0
            for k in range(i,j):
                if flag:res+=max(arr[k]-shift,0)
                else:res+=abs(arr[k]-shift) if arr[k]<shift else 0
                shift = arr[k]
            return res
        ans = 0
        while l<n:
            while l<n and arr[l]<=0:l+=1
            r = l
            while r<n and arr[r]>0:r+=1
            ans+=get(l,r,True)
            l = r+1
        l = 0
        while l<n:
            while l<n and arr[l]>=0:l+=1
            r = l
            while r<n and arr[r]<0:r+=1
            ans+=get(l,r,False)
            l = r+1
        return ans
